name: Codeless Page Builder
author: Codeless

sections.description:
Codeless Builder is a plugin created from Codeless. It is based on Kirki Framework.
With Codeless Page Builder you can edit every design aspects in real-time and visually everytime!

Included Elements:

  • Heading
  • Media (Images & Videos)
  • Text Editor
  • Button
  • Universal Service
  • Icon
  • Social Icons
  • Gallery (Carousel & Grids)
  • Lists
  • Counter
  • Progress Bar
  • Tabs
  • Toggles
  • Widgetized Area
  • Google Maps
  • Divider
  • Empty Space
  • Columns & Inner Columns

After installation a “Edit with Codeless Builder” button will appear on admin wordpress bar in front-end and on Edit Pages section in back-end
sections.installation:
1. Upload codeless-builder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Make sure you have installed and activated Kirki Framework Plugin
  4. That’s all!
sections.faq:
Is it Kirki Framework necessary to make this plugin work?

Yes, it’s necessary.

short_description: Codeless Page Builder is a FREE WordPress Page Builder, easy to use, based on Kirki Framework
